snippet: The Metropolitan Transportation Authority explains why it couldn’t use an American supplier for a bridge project.
abstract: Letter from Thomas F Prendergast, chairman, Metropolitan Transportation Authority, responds to Aug 5 Peter Navarro Op-Ed article criticizing use of Chinese steel in renovation of Verrazano-Narrows Bridge.
lead_paragraph: The Metropolitan Transportation Authority explains why it couldn’t use an American supplier for a bridge project.

headline.main: Buying Steel From China: The M.T.A. Explains
